Skipper-Scott" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: Fwd: Here is the draft press release that I'll email to Mike & Lee momentarily from my Samsung assuming it refreshes quickly >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) 08/10/2019 08:58 >>> Lamine, I am working with IPPA to finalize the press release (1st draft attached). Can you please give me answers to the below. (b)(3) Thanks, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Page 4426 DOJ-OGR-00024369

text_blocks.content: Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Subject: Fwd: Here is the draft press release that I'll email to Mike & Lee momentarily from my Samsung assuming it refreshes quickly
I am working with IPPA to finalize the press release (1st draft attached). Can you please give me answers to the below.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email chain discussing a press release related to Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email contains several redactions, likely due to FOIA exemptions.
